attributes.action: Reform the broken visa system keeping doctors and other skilled workers out
attributes.additional_details:
Taking back control over our immigration does not mean rejecting talented people who work skilled jobs, pay lots of taxes and contribute to the UK economy! 

Media coverage:

NHS: http://practicebusiness.co.uk/health-leaders-warn-against-tier-2-visa-cap/ | https://www.theguardian.com/society/2018/may/02/labour-urges-ministers-to-allow-nhs-to-bring-in-foreign-doctors

General: http://workpermit.com/news/uk-tier-2-visa-salary-requirement-ps50000-plus-out-reach-non-eu-lawyers-accountants-and-others
attributes.background:
Hundreds of NHS workers, and thousands of other professionals such as software engineers and lawyers are being prevented from entering the UK by an antiquated Tier 2 visa quota set up long before Brexit.

Europeans are leaving the country, so we need doctors and other professionals more than ever.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about visa rules, but we're not sure exactly what changes you'd like to see. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
